Ah, ok.

::Darkmouse::

Darkmouse laughs, but with little humor behind it. She didn't like 
causing battles.

"Well, I guess so. Do you think they'll attack?"

> OOC: Dollen, DrillBit, and Dark Mouse are at the same table.
